resources.string: Keep screen active while using app
Send any questions or bug reports
Share your opinions about this app

1.7.5
 - added 3 new songs in Spanish


1.7.4
 - fixed song #127 typo in English

 - maintenance cleanup
 - fixed song #54 typo in Spanish


1.7.2
 - fixed song #130 chorus in English and Spanish

1.7.1
 - new app name


1.7
 - New app name!
 - updated edits to new songs


1.6.11
 - added additional verse to song #136 in English and Spanish


1.6.10
 - added songs #140-142 in Spanish
 - fixed typo song #73 in Spanish


1.6.9
 - added songs #140-142 in English

1.6.8

1.6.7
 - added 3 new songs in Spanish


1.6.6
 - added 3 new songs in English


1.6.5
 - fixed bug where songs don't display if system language is Spanish


1.6.4
 - minor bug and translation fixes


1.6.3
 - Song lyrics are now in Spanish. Go to Settings and click on Language to switch between English and Spanish.
 - Added new About section


02/02/2014
 bug fixes
 - screen sleep now remembers settings after closing and reopening app


01/29/2014
 bug fixes
 - special characters are now displayed correctly
 new stuff
 - updated navigation! To get back to the list of songs, simply tap the app icon in the top left corner, or tap on the back button at the bottom of your screen. Double tap the back button to exit the app.
 - set screen to not turn off while using the app, in settings menu
